name: LyfAI-SmartHomeOrganizingAssistant
0:
”Alexa, open LYFAI”
”Alexa, ask LYFAI to find my skateboard”
”Alexa, ask LYFAI to search for camping equipment”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lyfai
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Works in conjunction with LyfAI mobile app available on App Store and Google Play

https://apps.apple.com/us/app/lyfai/id1549739539
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.lyfai.app

Why do I need LyfAI?


Imagine having the personal assistant always available and a GPS for your things so you can effortlessly organize and retrieve your stuff. The LyfAI skill effortlessly organizes -- and finds -- things quickly. Our goal is to help you bring order to your current life and reduce the need to buy additional stuff, which we believe will lead to a more joyful, less consumer-focused lifestyle.


How often have you bought something because you didn’t remember you already owned it or simply couldn’t find it?


How many hours of your life have been spent looking for things that aren’t where they belong because you can’t remember where you put them?


How many times have you started an organizing project only to give up after a few hours because the process was just too painstaking and tedious?


By using LyfAI, none of this will happen again.


Joyful Organizing!

With the help of computer vision, your items are automatically labeled. That makes organizing fun and easy.


Powerful Search!

Be in control. Locate your things easily. Save time.

“Alexa, ask LyfAI, where did I put my spare AA batteries?”


Data Protection!

We use top of the line security practices and encryption to protect your data. You can export your data anytime.


Always Free!

To reverse consumerism we need to change consumer habits. To make that dream come true LyfAI has to stay free. Forever.


LyfAI gives people a MINIMALIST LIFESTYLE feeling while preserving the ACCESS to the abundance of things.


Try it out and let us know what do you think.
